paragraph.1: We are architects, friends and founders of architectural design studio ZOA ARCHITEKCI. We’ve been working together for 20 years. We understand diversity and complexity of the world, we like to listen and we find great pleasure in what we do. Each project is an opportunity for us to look carefully at our client’s needs and to explore the potential of a place. Our team is constantly seeking for the best urban and architectural solutions - the ones that would not only fulfill the client’s expectations, but also enrich the space, making it valuable for its current and future occupants
paragraph.2: The portfolio of ZOA ARCHITEKCI architecture studio includes dozens of various projects, including residential, office, retail, sports or medical buildings. A significant part of them are orders obtained through competitions. Our projects are located in many Polish cities. For several years we have also been designing in Sub-Saharan Africa. Until 2020, we operated under the name OPEN architekci.

2008.1: 4th prize in a competition recommended by SARP for the seat of Teatr Nowy in Warsaw

2009.1: 3rd prize in the TUP competition on the Vistula Boulevards in Warsaw
2009.2: First prize in the competition for the design of the Pediatric Hospital of the Medical University of Warsaw in Warsaw

2010.1: 1st prize in the SARP competition for the interior revitalization project of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Warsaw
2010.2: Second prize in the SARP competition for the extension of the Maternity Hospital at Karowa Street in Warsaw

2011.1: Second prize in the SARP competition for the reconstruction of the building of the Faculty of Journalism and Political Sciences of the University of Warsaw in Warsaw
2011.2: Honorable mention in the SARP competition for the design of the building of the Sculpture Department of the Academy of Fine Arts in Warsaw

2012.1: 1st prize in the competition for the Konstancińskie Center of Hydrotherapy in Konstancin Jeziorna

2013.1: Construction Company of the Year Builder in the Architectural Studio category

2016.1: Nomination for the award of the President of the Capital City of Warsaw in the category of "Public utility building" for the Pediatric Hospital of the Medical University of Warsaw in Warsaw

2019.1: Second prize in the competition for the design of Żerański Park
2019.2: 2nd prize in the competition for the design of the Polonia Stadium

2020.1: Second prize in the competition for the design of the PUM clinical-teaching and broadcasting building in Szczecin
